text: احشروا۟ الذين ظلموا۟ وازوجهم وما كانوا۟ يعبدون

translations.translation: Assemble those who did wrong together with their associates and what they worshipped
Gather all the wicked together and their comrades, and those they had worshipped
(Then will the command be given): “Muster all the wrong-doers and their spouses and the deities whom they used to serve
(God will command the angels), "Gather together the unjust, their spouses, and what they had worshipped
“Gather all the unjust persons and their spouses, and all that they used to worship!” –
(It will be said to the angels:) Assemble those who did wrong, together with their companions and what they used to worship,
Gather together those who were unjust and their associates, and what they used to worship
Muster those who did evil, their wives, and that they were serving,
(And it is said unto the angels): Assemble those who did wrong, together with their wives and what they used to worship
But We shall say, "Assemble those who did wrong together with their associates and what they worshipped
Gather together those who did wrong and their comrades and that which they were wont to worship
‘Muster the wrongdoers and their mates and what they used to worship
Bring ye up", it shall be said, "The wrong-doers and their wives, and the things they worshipped-
(It will be said to the angels): "Assemble those who did wrong, together with their companions (from the devils) and what they used to worship.
Gather together the evildoers, their wives, and that they were worshipping,
Gather those who did wrong, and their mates, and what they used to worship.
[The angels will be ordered], "Gather those who committed wrong, their kinds, and what they used to worship

[37:22] It is then said to the angels: ‘Gather those who did wrong, to their own souls through idolatry, together with their mates, their associates from among the devils, and what they used to worship,

Allah would then say to the angels: (Assemble those who did wrong) assemble those who associated partners with Allah, (together with their wives) with their friends and those who are of their calibre from among the jinn, humans and satans (and what they used to worship) of idols

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { ٱحْشُرُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ وَأَزْوَاجَهُمْ } معناه وأمثالُهُمْ وأَشباهُهُم وضُرباؤهُمْ

translations.translation: And His saying, {Assemble those who did wrong and their spouses}, means their likes and their similar and their analogy and their parables.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ثم أمر سبحانه للملائكة المترصدين لأمره القائمين لحكمه: { ٱحْشُرُواْ } وسوقوا { ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ } بالخروج عن مقتضى الحدود الإلهية
 واجمعوهم للحشر { وَأَزْوَاجَهُمْ } أي: أشباههم وأمثالهم وقرناءهم الذين اقتدوا واقتفوا أثرهم معهم { وَ } أحضروا له أيضاً معهم { مَا كَانُواْ يَعْبُدُونَ } [الصافات: 22] { مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ } ظلماً وعدواناً

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
يقول الحق جلّ جلاله للملائكة يوم القيامة: { احْشُرُوا الذين ظلموا } أي: اجمعوا الذين كفروا { وأزواجَهم } وأَشباهَهم، فيُحشر عابد الصنم مع عبدة الأصنام، وعابد الكواكب مع عبدتها
 أو: نساءهم الكافرات، أو: قرناءهم من الشياطين
 و " الواو " بمعنى " مع " ، أو: عاطفة
